scripts.build: bun build ./src/runtime/runtime.ts --outfile ./dist/runtime/runtime.js --external @gooi/kernel-contracts/invocation --external @gooi/kernel-contracts/trace --external @gooi/host-contracts/portset && bun build ./src/invocation/invocation.ts --outfile ./dist/invocation/invocation.js --external @gooi/host-contracts/portset && bun build ./src/trace/trace.ts --outfile ./dist/trace/trace.js --external @gooi/kernel-contracts/orchestration && bun build ./src/orchestration/orchestration.ts --outfile ./dist/orchestration/orchestration.js --external @gooi/kernel-contracts/invocation && bun build ./src/semantic-engine/semantic-engine.ts --outfile ./dist/semantic-engine/semantic-engine.js --external @gooi/capability-contracts/capability-port --external @gooi/host-contracts/principal --external @gooi/app-spec-contracts/compiled --external @gooi/surface-contracts/signal-envelope && bun build ./src/projection-semantic/projection-semantic.ts --outfile ./dist/projection-semantic/projection-semantic.js --external @gooi/contract-primitives/json --external @gooi/guard-contracts/envelopes/guard-envelopes --external @gooi/guard-contracts/errors/guard-errors --external @gooi/guard-contracts/signals/guard-violation-signal --external @gooi/projection-contracts/errors/projection-errors && bun build ./src/entrypoint-runtime/entrypoint-runtime.ts --outfile ./dist/entrypoint-runtime/entrypoint-runtime.js --external @gooi/host-contracts/portset --external @gooi/host-contracts/principal --external @gooi/host-contracts/replay --external @gooi/kernel-contracts/semantic-engine --external @gooi/app-spec-contracts/compiled --external @gooi/surface-contracts/result-envelope --external @gooi/surface-contracts/surface-request
